sect2.title: Installation of GPM
sect2.para: Download the patches for GPM from .
Install GPM by running the following commands:

userinput.command: patch -Np0 -i ../gpm-1.20.1-smooth-cursor.patch && patch -Np1 -i ../gpm-1.20.1-segfault.patch && patch -Np1 -i ../gpm-1.20.1-silent.patch && LDFLAGS="-lm" ./configure --prefix=/usr && make && make install

sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: export LDFLAGS="-lm" : The math library must be linked with gpm, as ceil() is used in some cursor scrolling logic. LDFLAGS is only needed if you optimize gpm for size.
